Job Posting:173801 - Position: W26 Coop Work Experience Student 173801 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 10/09/2025 11:59 PM Through Employer Website 09/24/2025 12:13 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Alberta Health Services Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2026 - Winter W26 Coop Work Experience Student 173801 Co-op Position Edmonton, AB Canada 4 months CAD 17.53 per hour for 0 Major List Job Title: Coop Work Experience Student Job ID: ALB00520805 Application Deadline: October 9, 2025 Description: There is flexibility as to the location of this position within the Province of Alberta. At the time of appointment, the successful candidate may discuss location options with the hiring manager (office/home office/hybrid). The students will be required to attend meetings and workshops in person in the office. Various Information Technology Co-op Student positions are available. AHS provides a wide range of learning opportunities for students. The AHS IT team is one of the largest in Canada and has over 2500 employees across the province. The IT Team is a very dynamic and driven group who engage in complex, challenging and diverse projects to deliver collective results. Through quality work and innovative solutions, we meet the ever-changing needs of Albertans. Please Note: This posting is for current students only; you must be currently enrolled in an applicable post-secondary program and continuing your studies in the next term for the duration of the placement. Students that have graduated or will graduate before the placement begins are not eligible to apply. All students must reside in Alberta during their employment with AHS, and do not subsidize relocation expenses. • Classification: Coop Work Experience Student • Union: Students • Unit and Program: Coop Work Experience program • Primary Location: CN Tower • Location Details: Eligible to work hybrid (on/off site) within Alberta • Temporary Employee Class: Student • FTE: 0.00 • Posting End Date: 29-SEP-2025 • Date Available: 09-OCT-2025 • Temporary End Date: 27-MAR-2026 • Hours per Shift: 7.75 • Length of Shift in weeks: Varies • Shifts per cycle: Varies • Shift Pattern: Days • Days Off: Saturday/Sunday • Minimum Salary: $17.53 • Maximum Salary: $23.01 Vehicle Requirement: Not Applicable • Job Requirements Required Qualifications: Current enrolment in a CO-OP/Work experience program in IT, Engineering, AI field. Registered in a related field of study at a Canadian post-secondary institution. Additional Required Qualifications: Ability to work both independently and as part of a professional team. Ability to communicate confidently and professionally. Ability to take initiative and be responsible. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Strong presentation skills. Ability to multi- task. Self-directed, highly motivated, results driven. Proficiency in Microsoft Office and other computer applications. Knowledge in at least one programing language. Preferred Qualifications: Strong presentation skills. Ability to multi-task. Self-directed, highly motivated, results driven. Proficiency in Microsoft Office and other computer applications. Knowledge in at least one programing language. Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://careers.albertahealthservices.ca/jobs/coop-work-experience-student-536597 Application Deadline: October 9, 2025 Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
